        IQueryBeanResult<Activity> findOpenActivitiesByGroups(Key[] groupIDs)
        Finds all open activities that are assigned to one of the groupIDs.
        Parameters:
        groupIDs - List of Keys identifiying groups.
        Returns:
        QueryProcessor containing all open activities associated with designated groups.
